name: AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_viewOrManageDocumentReviewSettings
description: Interface to handle Document review in the settings page
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!triggerRefresh,
  local!selectedReview,
  local!showHistory,
  local!searchText,
  {
    if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!selectedReview),
      rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_viewDocReviews(
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        selectedReview: local!selectedReview,
        showHistory: local!showHistory,
        searchText: local!searchText
      ),
      if(
        local!showHistory,
        rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_viewTemplateHistory(
          i18nData: local!i18nData,
          selectedTemplate: local!selectedReview,
          showHistory: local!showHistory,
          subHeaderBundleKey: "lbl_ReviewHistory",
          backBundleKey: "lbl_BackToReviews",
          triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_TMG_CPS_manageDocReviews(
          i18nData: local!i18nData,
          triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
          selectedReview: local!selectedReview
        )
      )
    )
  }
)
